price: (Isa irraa) nyaadhaa; beyladoota keessanis dheechisaa, Dhugumatti, kana keessa namoota qalbiilee (sammuu) qabaniif mallattoleetu jira.
arabic: كُلُواْ وَٱرۡعَوۡاْ أَنۡعَٰمَكُمۡۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّأُوْلِي ٱلنُّهَىٰ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: kulū wa-ir'ʿaw anʿāmakum inna fī dhālika laāyātin li-ulī al-nuhā
